alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 4:12PM EDT until May 13 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 411 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Loxahatchee NWR, or 12 miles southwest of Wellington, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Royal Palm Beach and Loxahatchee NWR. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
